title: Nine Witches: Family Disruption
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Not Supported**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: When an occult German WW2 division releases an ancient curse upon the world, a supernatural problem is going to require a supernatural solution. Take control of two playable heroes as they embark on a comedic, alternate-history adventure with a truly original story (99.9999% guaranteed).
